title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2612/94 of 27 October 1994 opening quantitative import quotas for textile products in categories 127 B and 145 from the People's Republic of China and amending Annexes IV and V to Council Regulation (EC) No 517/94 on common rules for imports of textile products from certain third countries
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2612/94 of 27 October 1994 opening quantitative import quotas for textile products in categories 127 B and 145 from the People's Republic of China and amending Annexes IV and V of Council Regulation (EC) No 517/94 on  common rules for imports of textile products from certain third countries
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Imports into the Community of textile products in categories 127 B and 145 from the People's Republic of China shall be subject to annual quantitative limits of 5 and 7 tonnes respectively to be administered in accordance with the procedure  provided for in Article 17 of Regulation (EC) No 517/94.
Annexes IV and V to Council Regulation (EC) No 517/94 shall be amended as shown in the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 October 1994.
For the Commission
Leon BRITTAN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 67, 10. 3. 1994, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 183, 19. 7. 1994, p. 9.

ANNEX V
referred to in Article 3 (3)
(The product descriptions of the categories listed in this Annex are to be found in Annex I A to this Regulation)
CHINA
Categories: 121, 125 A, 126, 127 A, 133, 137, 141, 146 A, 146 B, 151 B.'
(1) Categories marked by "ex" cover products other than those of wool or fine hairs, cotton or synthetic or artificial textile materials.
(2) This category only covers woven fabrics and other silk products other than unbleached, scoured or bleached falling within CN codes 5007 20 19, 5007 20 31, 5007 20 39, 5007 20 41, 5007 20 59, 5007 20 61, 5007 20 69, 5007 20 71, 5007 90 30, 5007 90  50, 5007 90 90.
